revised_title: Forecasting the Effects of Polluting Discharges on Rivers: A Case Study of the River Trent
tldr: This article discusses the importance of forecasting the effects of polluting discharges on rivers to maintain water quality and utilize water resources efficiently. It focuses on a case study of the River Trent, examining the mass balance of pollutants and the factors affecting water quality. The authors explore methods to predict the impact of pollution on water quality and suggest ways to improve water management.
